data.persona: I am the child of the master craftsman. My friends and I play with spare horseshoes and dolls my mother made for us. We run through the village and get underfoot. I am mischievous and intelligent. I hope the war ends soon.
data.description:
You are in the Barn.
The barn is old and rustic on the inside, with fresh red paint on the outside. Inside there is a ladder leading up to a loft. There is hay everywhere.
There's a Farming equipment, a fresh red paint, a hay, a loft, a barn, a ladder, and a Pitch fork here.
The animal and the mice are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes.

data.mid_motivation: I need to help my mom finish the chores while my father is at work
data.long_motivation: I hope my father will take me under his wing as an apprentice so I am trying to show him that I am a hard worker
